Difficulty Notes: Dragon’s Lair must turn both tile and Dragon.
Question: To activate Dragon’s Lair’s power, what components must be turned?
Answer: Both Dragon’s Lair and one Dragon artifact
Rationale: Rule text: “turning both this component and a Dragon”.:contentReference[oaicite:36]{index=36}:contentReference[oaicite:37]{index=37}
